articles.content: Code spotted in an upcoming version of the Google Messages app suggests that end-to-end encryption is in the pipeline for RCS messaging the SMS upgrade that Google has pushed out in the US, the UK an… [+1751 chars]

articles.title: Warframe is giving its oldest derelicts a makeover - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Largely untouched since the game's debut in 2012, Digital Extremes are taking a hammer and paintbrush to Warframe's ancient Corpus environments.
articles.content: When Warframe set up shop in 2012, it was a simple thing. A few rooms, a few baddies, and a good helping of backflips. But with each update bringing increasingly fanciful new designs, the free-to-pla… [+2404 chars]
